attributes.action: I call upon the government to cancel all sporting events due to Coronavirus.
attributes.background:
Coronavirus is spreading out of control.
I believe that the government should advise sporting bodies to cancel all live sporting events in the UK until Coronavirus is under control.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
